page.title: 15Families - Mark
page.content: I am 7 years old and my name is Mark Hardacre. I live on Blackheath in a new house that was built by Jo Sinden's dad. I have a sister called Stacey who is 5. We used to live in Great Cornard, near Sudbury. My dad is a manager for Everest Double Glazing, and his name is John: my Mum is called Beverley. We have two cars, one is a Jaguar and one is a Prarie. I am not very big, but I like eating so I will grow. My favourite food is steak and kidney pie, but I hate eggs. I like school which is Wenhaston Primary and I like maths, English, reading and topic work. My favourite book is Grimm's Fairy Tales. But I like all books. One of my Grannies lives in Italy, and the other lives in Sudbury. I am going to Italy for Christmas. My Asthma is better when I am in Italy.
